2022340.name: Kargo Demo
2022340.description:
This demo provides a vertical slice of the game Kargo with a selection of levels to show off the core gameplay mechanics. It's still an early version, so things might change until the full release.

Please leave any feedback you might have in the Steam Forums and don't forget to wishlist!

Kargo is a 2D cave-flyer with a focus on puzzle elements. Your goal is to deliver cargo containers to their designated targets. Navigate your spaceship through the levels with Asteroids-like controls. Gates, cannons and other level elements are color-coded and activate when the corresponding cargo item is present. Figure out the right order in which to collect cargo, use them as keys and deliver them to their targets.

Kargo is heavily inspired by classics such as Crazy Gravity and similar cafe-flyers. However, its unique combination of puzzle solving, precision flying and shooting cargo with modern controller support, provides a fresh experience into the genre.

The game was designed for small screen sizes and controllers, so it's best played on the Steam Deck (or similar handheld consoles).
